description: Try our easy to follow Pork Ribs & Cabbage Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pork Ribs & Cabbage Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine chilli, tomato and soy sauce in a large bowl. Add pork rashers, turning to coat with marinade. Cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes.
Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Transfer pork to prepared tray and bake for 25 minutes or until golden and cooked through.

Meanwhile, combine cabbage, carrot, ginger, coriander and sesame seeds in a bowl. Whisk oil, vinegar, salt and pepper in a jug. Add to salad and toss to combine. Place pork on plates and serve with cabbage salad.
